Instruction: Preheat an oven to 350°F (175°C) and use olive oil to grease a baking sheet.
Coat potato wedges with butter and breadcrumbs, then arrange them on the greased baking sheet.

Brush the potato wedges with butter, sprinkle them with bread crumbs, and place them on the prepared baking sheet. Bake for 20 minutes. Then, turn the wedges over and continue baking for an additional 10 to 15 minutes or until they are tender.
